sentences.en: Append access can only be requested in Write - only mode.
sentences.cn: 只能在只写模式中请求追加访问权.

sentences.en: Append content to the inside of every matched element.
sentences.cn: 向每个匹配的元素内部追加内容.

sentences.en: Append the sprite's new location to my dirty _ rects list.
sentences.cn: 把精灵的新区域加到我的dirty_rects中去.

sentences.en: Create a signature to append to your outgoing messages.
sentences.cn: 创建签名以便将其附加到发送的邮件中.

sentences.en: Example # 4 shows how to append text to an existing file.
sentences.cn: 示例 # 4说明如何将文本追加到现有文件的末尾.

sentences.en: Failed to append to the table -- Out of memory.
sentences.cn: 无法向表格中新增记录 —— 内存不足.

sentences.en: I append a list of those shops which sell our products.
sentences.cn: 我附上一张出售我们产品的商店名单.

sentences.en: If you get an operand, append it to the output expression.
sentences.cn: 如果你拿到的是运算子, 把它加到输出算式.

sentences.en: Note: Use APPEND to avoid deleting the existing content of the file.
sentences.cn: 注意: 使用APPEND避免删除文件的现存内容.

sentences.en: Note: Use FILE _ APPEND to avoid deleting the existing content of the file.
sentences.cn: 注意: 使用FILE_APPEND避免删除文件的现存内容.

sentences.en: Organisers may amend or append the terms and conditions without prior notification.
sentences.cn: 主办单位有权修改参赛条规而不事先知会.

sentences.en: She appended a note at the end of the letter.
sentences.cn: 她在信件尾部附加了一个说明。

sentences.en: Smiley, as requested to do, and I hereunto append the result.
sentences.cn: 这件受人之托的事究竟结果如何, 我来做个交代.

sentences.en: The operation was not performed because both overwrite and append were specified.
sentences.cn: 由于指定了改写和附加,未能执行操作.

sentences.en: Unable to append backup set to full media.
sentences.cn: 无法将备份集附加到已满的媒体.

sentences.en: You can use class to append messages to specific trace categories.
sentences.cn: 可以使用此类将消息追加到特定的跟踪类别.

words.tran_cn: 附加物；下属；[动][解剖] 附器（如植物的枝叶和动物的腿尾）

trans.tran_cn: 设置数据文件的搜索路径

trans.tran_en: to add something to a piece of writing
to add something to a piece of writing
